hotels.name: Hotel Ritz
hotels.description: Hotel Ritz Madrid is a 5-star hotel located in Madrid, Spain. It overlooks the Prado Museum and is considered one of the top hotels in the world.

hotels.name: Hotel Splendid
hotels.description: Hotel Splendid is a luxurious 5-star resort situated on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea in Nice, France. It offers breathtaking views and world-class amenities.

hotels.name: Hotel Paradise
hotels.description: Hotel Paradise is a tropical paradise located on a pristine island in the Maldives. Guests can enjoy crystal-clear waters and overwater bungalows.

hotels.name: Hotel Elegance
hotels.description: Hotel Elegance is a charming boutique hotel in the heart of Paris, France. It offers a unique blend of modern comfort and classic French elegance.

hotels.name: Hotel Oasis
hotels.description: Hotel Oasis is a beachfront resort in Cancun, Mexico. It features stunning white sandy beaches and a vibrant nightlife.
